name: Scary Stranger: Gorilla Pranks
description:
Hey everybody ! A Crazy Gorilla has escaped from the zoo van and have hide himself in a big villa, and the owners of the house are unaware of his presence, it happens to that gorilla really like this villa and planning to live his live in the villa. Now he is pranking the owners in different ways possible.

Now Enjoy Scary Stranger With amazing sound Effects
Big villa Environment
Multiple Pranks Levels
Fun and smooth Gameplay
Amazing and unique Storyline.
